metadata.title: CVE-2017-17555 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: The swri_audio_convert function in audioconvert.c in FFmpeg libswresamplethrough 3.0.101, as used in FFmpeg 3.4.1, aubio 0.4.6, and other products,allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (NULL pointerdereference and application crash) via a crafted audio file.

criterions.comment: aubio: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
